description:
Dear members,

I'm happy to see that many of you joined this group in a fast and enthousiastic way! so I am very motivated and decided to organize a first meetup of Mirror of Sounds on sunday 12th of january 2014.

I will first make a short presentation of Cymatics and the principles of sound waves, frequencies and some ancient traditions related to the art of sounds. 

Then we will share our different experiences and practice of sound (music, healing practice and tool of personnal development...) 

I hope that after that meeting we will be able to connect and eventually draw some lines for a future collaborative project of live performance.

Please don't hesitate to bring documentation, books etc...in order to share about our different backgrounds and expectations.

Cake & Hot drinks will be available... Especially Tulsi Indian organic tea provided by "Vidya ayurvedic food" aisbl.

 Dahlia
name: First discovery meetup to present Mirror of Sounds & Cymatics
